structure.unit: ARTICLE III. REDEVELOPMENT OF MIAMI BEACH CITY CENTER/HISTORIC CONVENTION VILLAGE REDEVELOPMENT AND REVITALIZATION AREA

law.catch_line: Review of financial records; right of audit.

text.section:
Sec. 30A-53. Review of financial records; right of audit.
The financial records for the redevelopment trust fund shall be prepared pursuant to Section 163.387(8), Florida Statutes and shall be available for County inspection. The County reserves the right of audit of the fund.
